rows.label: tev068801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gu Ludho about the life of a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gu Ludho if she's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gu Ludho what she intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gu Ludho about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0001
rows.name:
I do not mind being sent to this city to reinforce the
humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0002
rows.name:
But this place is so strange to me. Jumbled layers and
rows of identical buildings? Roads where one misstep
sends you tumbling into some queer liquid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Recently, I even found myself lost here in the residential
district and needed Lucia to save me. How pathetic![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Much to my surprise, kind Lucia did not berate me for
my failings, but instead invited me to her domicile and
permitted me to cleanse myself in this pond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0005
rows.name:
This city makes it difficult for covert operatives to
carry out their missions...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0010
rows.name:
There are still great warriors who have the faith and
trust of His Highness at our refuge in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0011
rows.name:
But at the moment, we are facing a great trial that
even they cannot overcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0012
rows.name:
You BLADEs have been traveling around the world
aiding xenoforms, have you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Should you ever find yourself in Oblivia, I would be
most relieved if you would pay my people a visit and
look into their situation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0018
rows.name:
I was tasked with a mission to assassinate a certain
Ganglion loyalist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0019
rows.name:
I hunted down my quarry, but just as I was about to
deliver the killing blow, I began to wonder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0020
rows.name:
Did this man have a family? Did he have devoted
friends like Lucia who cared for him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0021
rows.name:
As these traitorous thoughts swirled in my head,
my hand wavered and I let him escape.
I am a failure as an operative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0022
rows.name:
It seems that when Luxaar was destroyed,
any desire I had to do such work died with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0023
rows.name:
Lately, my mind has wandered to thoughts of living
someplace bright and working in one of the tea shops
you call "caffays."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0028
rows.name:
I have received a missive from my companions back at
the refuge in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0029
rows.name:
They say that a certain BLADE has visited the refuge
and settled all of the remaining worriments that had
been plaguing our people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0030
rows.name:
I understand that the BLADE in question goes by the
name of [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev068801_MSG0031
rows.name:
You are a BLADE yourself, are you not? Would you
happen to be acquainted with this talented warrior?[ST:wait ]
